title: Reverse Cavities and Heal Tooth Decay with Vitamin D
subtitle: Alternative health websites tout the idea that a diet rich in vitamin D can help regrow material lost to cavities, but this claim rests on the misinterpretation of a paper published in 1932, and of science in general.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A diet rich in vitamin D can reverse tooth decay and regrow portions of teeth lost to cavities.
